title: All Them Witches - Our Mother Electricity  mp3 VBR  2014
description:
All Them Witches - Our Mother Electricity  mp3 VBR  2014 What we got....All Them Witches earn immediate distinction for being the first American band signed to German heavy psych purveyors Elektrohasch Schallplatten. Endorsement from the label of Colour Haze guitarist/vocalist Stefan Koglek, which has released albums from My Sleeping Karma, Sungrazer, Rotor, Been Obscene and The Machine Ã¢â‚¬â€œ essentially casting the blueprint by which a goodly portion of the up and coming European scene is built Ã¢â‚¬â€œ goes a long way in my book, and the feat is even more impressive when one considers that the Nashville four-pieceÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s debut full-length, Our Mother Electricity (produced by the band with Andy Putnam), sounds so distinctly American. TheyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re not the first to use the wordplay, but in calling their approach Ã¢â‚¬Å“psychedelta rock,Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ neither are All Them Witches inaccurate. Swampy blues is definitely a major element in what they do, but along with that and the heavy psych aspect to their sound, thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s also a dynamic sense of Americana in the songwriting.
